summary: NHTSA#01-V-078-000 VEHICLE DESCRIPTION:  PASSENGER VEHICLES EQUIPPED WITH ADJUSTABLE PEDALS.    IF THE GREASE FROM THE ADJUSTABLE PEDAL ASSEMBLY ENTERS THE STOP LAMP SWITCH, IT CAN CONTAMINATE THE CONTACTS LEADING TO CARBON BUILD UP, AND POTENTIALLY A SHORT CIRCUIT. THE RECALL FAILED AND THE BRAKE LAMP SWITCH WAS REPLACED 6 TIMES.   *AK  *TS  *JB
